description.value:
The act of ritual, no matter how ostentatious, can be a route to mental strength. By engaging in esoteric and intricate routines, you have unlocked potent psychic power.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{Bless} (1st),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6orhthk4g27rncuu]{Calm Emotions} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jcr72piqo6g549e1]{Slow} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{Overwhelming Presence} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.weyfn0mg2oifasq1]{Seeming} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{Heroes' Feast} (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kqftgm3bi2dqj92l]{Mage's Magnificent Mansion} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zi1fpl4essgw5bbc]{Divine Vessel} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ueuz3ymuz8pxpzr6]{Heroic Invocation} (18th).
